Changes in ability: Bonus duration increased from 9 to 10 seconds

hero_notes.note: Changes in hero's base or general stats: Winning a Duel automatically casts Press the Attack on you
Changes in hero's base or general stats: Base movement speed increased from 270 to 315
Changes in hero's base or general stats: Base intelligence increased by 2

ability_notes.note: Changes in ability: Now does damage along the way (at half radius) instead of only at the destination

hero_notes.note: Changes in hero's base or general stats: Strength gain increased from 3.5 to 3.8

talent_notes.note: Changes in talent: Level 25 Talent changed from +1s Boulder Smash Stun duration to +0.75s Rolling Boulder Stun Duration

ability_notes.note: Changes in ability: Changed from an 80% slow for 0.4/0.6/0.8/1.0 seconds to a stun for 0.4/0.6/0.8/1.0
Changes in ability: Stun duration lasts an extra 0.4/0.6/0.8/1.0 seconds when using a rock
Changes in ability: Changed from a stun for 0.5/1/1.5/2 seconds to an 80% slow for 1.25/2.5/3.25/4 seconds
Changes in ability: Damage increased from 50/100/150/200 to 105/170/235/300
Changes in ability: Max charges increased from 6 to 7
Changes in ability: AoE increased from 300 to 350
Changes in ability: Now provides a permanent +2/3/4/5 bonus damage when a hero dies under the aura

talent_notes.note: Changes in talent: Level 20 Talent reduced from -10s Reflection Cooldown to -8

ability_notes.note: Changes in ability: Can no longer pierce Spell Immunity
Changes in ability: Slow rescaled from 28% to 19/22/25/28%
Changes in ability: Damage increased from 90/120/150/180 to 120/150/180/210

talent_notes.note: Changes in talent: Level 15 Talent changed from +350 Health to +300

ability_notes.note: Changes in ability: Bounty increased from a fixed 180 Gold/XP to 180/240/300
Changes in ability: Will now always transform into a courier when nearby another courier
Changes in ability: Now grants you 0.3 seconds of invulnerability when transforming into another unit
Changes in ability: Cooldown increased from 3 to 20

hero_notes.note: Changes in hero's base or general stats: Heartpiercer replaced with Lucky Shot
Changes in hero's base or general stats: Enabled in Captains Mode

talent_notes.note: Changes in talent: Level 20 Talent changed from +2 Hits to Kill Phantom to +1

ability_notes.note: Changes in ability: Now applies a Leashed state to the targets, disallowing teleportation and mobility based abilities
Changes in ability: Duration reduced from 6/8/10 to 6/7/8
Changes in ability: Creature now gets closer to the target before latching on
Changes in ability: Now does its maximum impact based on the duration it hit any hero
Changes in ability: Max stun duration reduced from 2.2/2.8/3.4/4 to 2/2.6/3.2/3.8
